Cobra Golf Demo Day at Winston Trails Golf Club
#tribe-events-header

Event content
Come Out To Winston Trails Golf Club on Friday. April 25th, From 11:00AM – 3:00PM to try out the latest in 2025 golf club technology from Wilson Golf. Club Fitters and Golf Professionals will be on site to help you pick out the perfect match for your Golf Game. For More information Please Call 561-439-3700.

Tournaments & Events
Play golf in Lake Worth, FL
From corporate events to fundraisers, WTGC has been hosting major golf tournaments for 20 years. Whether you are interested in holding a tournament for your company, favorite charity, baseball team, etc., WTGC’s staff are experts. From planning to execution we assist you in ensuring you have a successful event. We can show you how to raise the most money for your organization.
If you are interested in holding a golf tournament, please call Josh Davis or Brian Symonds at 561-439-3700 or 561-439-0009.

Membership Information
WT GOLF MEMBERSHIPS
Nov. 1st, 2025 – Oct. 31st, 2026
Single Golf Membership
$6999.00 +Tax (Includes Carts)
Monday – Sunday & Holidays
This membership includes carts, locker, bag storage, day range balls, golf handicap system, dining facilities, and all scheduled member tournaments. This golf membership includes the applicant as the only user of the golf facilities
Family Golf Membership
$9599.00 +Tax (Includes Carts)
Monday – Sunday & Holidays
This membership includes carts, locker, bag storage, day range balls, golf handicap system, dining facilites for the entire family and all scheduled member tournaments. This golf membership includes the applicant, spouse and any children under the age of 21 living at home. (Locker and Bag storage will be issued to the two adult members only)
Annual Winter / Summer Golf Program
$799.00 +Tax
Monday – Sunday & Holidays
This program membership has reduced monthly cart & green fees and includes day range balls for the year, 7-day advanced tee times. Optional amenities include bag storage & locker $395.00+TAX & USGA Handicap system $50. The programs reduced cart & green fees

Seasonal Golf Membership: Single / Family
November. 1st 2025 – April. 30th 2026
Single W/ Carts
– $6599,00 + TAX
Family W/ Carts
– $9299.00 + TAX
Family includes applicant, spouse & children under 21 living at home. This Membership includes Carts, greens fees & Unlimited Day range balls. Optional amenities include: Bag Storage $275.00+Tax & locker fees $175.00 +Tax Per Person.
Junior Golf Membership
(16 & Younger) $999.00 +Tax
This membership includes practice day range privileges 7-days a week and bag storage. Junior members pay cart fees only when they play. Member must have a valid driver’s license to operate a golf cart. Junior members 15 and under must be accompanied by an adult when renting a golf cart.
Practice Day Range Membership
Single: $999/
Family: $1200
Jr. $899 (16 & Younger)
Fees
Golf Locker (Annual): $199.00
Bag Storage (Annual): $299.00
Handicap (Annual) : $50.00

Our Staff
Brian Symonds
Brian Symonds has been a PGA Golf Professional since 1989 and is currently the owner of Winston Trails Golf Club in Lake Worth, Florida. Brian has been a golf instructor and coach on the PGA Tour since 1983.
He is currently a majority owner of the Brian Symonds Golf Design Company which manufactures putters and wedges that are played on all the professional tours around the world.   Brian also teaches the top junior golfers in the United States.
Winston Trails has twice been voted the #1 semi-private/public golf facility in South Florida.  Prior to Winston Trails Golf Club, Brian was the Director of Instruction at Boca Rio Golf Club in Boca Raton, Florida, for 12 years.
Josh Davis
Josh Davis has been the Director of Golf and Head Golf Professional at Winston Trails Golf Club since his arrival in Florida in 2002. As Director, he oversees all golf operations, including tournament programs, budgeting and staff supervision. He is a strong player, accomplished golf instructor and a consummate promoter of the game of golf. Josh creates a welcoming atmosphere for family and friends to enjoy the game that he loves so much.
Although Josh enjoys teaching advanced players, he also takes pride in helping amateur students reach their full potential. He has spent countless hours studying different golf swings and body types. He believes that in order for students to change their bad habits, they must first understand why they are making a correction and what the correction will do. Josh is a sought after golf instructor and club fitter. He prides himself in keeping up with the latest technology and development in golf equipment and advises his clientele accordingly. Whether you are looking to lower your score or just learn the basics, Josh will provide the specific skills for a great game. His number one responsibility is to ensure the tradition of excellence at Winston Trails Golf Club with 100% guest satisfaction.
Prior to his arrival at Winston Trails Golf Club, he served as First Assistant at Kokopelli Country Club in Marion, Illinois from 1996–1999. He then went on to The Evansville Country Club from 1999-2002. Josh resides in The Village of Wellington with his wife Darci and two sons, Kyle and Quinn.
Mike Davis
Mike grew up in Stuart, Florida where he began his golf course career at the age of 16. His passion for working on golf courses led him to attend Indian River State College to pursue a degree in Golf Course Management. Mike has been a member of the Golf Course Superintendent Association of America for the past 9 years. He started at Winston Trails Golf Club in August 2012 and strives to make Winston Trails one of the best places to play golf.
